choose-dic: To study a foreign language, select a dictionary (if not already selected)
open-txt: Or upload your dictionary below as a .txt file. Write each new word in it on a new line. Separate the translation with an equals sign. Like this:
example: foreign word = translation to your language
tts-lang: Select the language for voicing the foreign text
assemble-parts: Check how well you know. Assemble the translation from the parts below
all-matched: Congratulations! You've matched all. Delete the familiar and click Next
all-learned: Now your dictionary is empty. Select a dictionary to study.
tips-text: Don't be afraid to make mistakes. The result depends on how quickly and regularly you repeat it over and over again. It is not the strongest, the smartest, or the most talented who wins, but the one who never gives up.

cookie.message: This website uses cookies to ensure the best user experience. Please review our <1>Privacy Policy</1>.

select-spot-first: First, select where you want to place it.
equal-sign-error: The translation must contain exactly one equal sign (=) separating the foreign word from its translation.
add-entries-instruction: Add each entry on a new line. Separate the translation with an equal sign ( = ).

reset.title: Repeat unfinished learning?
reset.message: The most important thing in learning is repetition! Do you want to start again with what you haven't learned yet?

telegram: Have questions? Ask in our Telegram group
howto: Perform the steps below from 1 to 4
